President Trump reportedly said his continued delays on a rightful transition are to “get back at Democrats.”  The reality is his actions aren’t hurting Democrats.  They’re hurting this country.  They’re hurting democracy.  And they’re hurting whatever legacy Trump has left.
GSA must unlock all pandemic transition planning capabilities for President-elect @JoeBiden now.  This is ridiculous and lives are at stake.

The latest COVID vaccine news is excellent.  There is a light at the end of the tunnel.  Let’s work together and follow the COVID safety steps.   We won’t need to do this forever.   But we need to do it for a while longer.

Mitch McConnell and our Republican colleagues must acknowledge the need for bold action on the COVID crisis and come to the table to work on meaningful relief.   Their denial delays and distractions only further divide our country.
We must continue to reject the false choice between healthy people and a healthy economy.   We can’t have one without the other and we must keep fighting for both.

My colleagues still in denial about the presidential election results are doing serious damage to American democracy making it even harder to address the massive health and economic crises we face. It’s time to move on and get to work.
